name: Player Attack
note:
<setup action>
  clear battle log
  immortal: targets, true
  RESET DAMAGE MODIFIERS
</setup action>

<target action>
  EVAL: Talonos.correct = false;
  animation 125: target
  wait: 3
  jump user: 30, 12
  move user: target, base, 12
  wait: 10
  MOTION SWING: user
  wait: 10
  action animation
  if (Input.wasPressedRecently("ok", 135))
    DAMAGE RATE: 125%
    animation 123: target
    animation 127: target
    animation 162: target
    EVAL: Talonos.correct = true;
  end
  if (Input.wasPressedRecently("ok", 700) && !Talonos.correct)
    animation 161: target
    animation 126: target
  end
  if (!Input.wasPressedRecently("ok", 700) && !Talonos.correct)
    animation 126: target
    animation 163: target
  end
  action effect
  if $gameVariables.value(2)==1 &&user.mp>=2
    DAMAGE RATE: 25%
    FORCE ELEMENT: 3
    animation 9: target
    wait: 3
    action effect
    MP -2: user
  end
  if $gameVariables.value(2)==2 &&user.mp>=4
    DAMAGE RATE: 50%
    FORCE ELEMENT: 6
    animation 133: target
    zoom: 1.1, 2
    wait: 2
    zoom: 1, 2
    action effect
    wait: 2
    zoom: 1.1, 2
    wait: 2
    zoom: 1, 2
    MP -4: user
  end
  if $gameVariables.value(2)==3 &&user.mp>=6
    DAMAGE RATE: 75%
    FORCE ELEMENT: 2
    animation 8: target
    wait: 3
    action effect
    MP -6: user
  end
  if $gameVariables.value(2)==4 &&user.mp>=8
    DAMAGE RATE: 100%
    FORCE ELEMENT: 4
    animation 10: target
    wait: 3
    action effect
    MP -8: user
    wait: 6
  end
  move target: BACKWARD, 8, 0
  death break
  move target: home, 16
  CLEAR ELEMENT
</target action>

<follow action>

</follow action>

<finish action>
  move user: Home, 8
  face user: target
  immortal: targets, false
  wait for new line
  clear battle log
  wait for effect
  action common event
  wait: 12
</finish action>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

name: Monster Attack
note:
<setup action>
  clear battle log
  immortal: targets, true
  RESET DAMAGE MODIFIERS
</setup action>

<target action>
  EVAL: Talonos.correct = false;
  animation 125: target
  wait: 12
  jump user: 30, 12
  move user: target, base, 12
  motion attack: user
  action animation
  wait: 12
  eval: console.log("Here: ")
  if (Input.wasPressedRecently("ok", 135))
    DAMAGE RATE: 80%
    animation 122: target
    animation 127: target
    animation 162: target, mirror
    EVAL: Talonos.correct = true;
  end
  if (Input.wasPressedRecently("ok", 700) && !Talonos.correct)
    animation 161: target, mirror
    animation 126: target
  end
  if (!Input.wasPressedRecently("ok", 700) && !Talonos.correct)
    animation 126: target
    animation 163: target, mirror
  end
  action effect
  move target: BACKWARD, 12, 0
  death break
  move target: home, 16
  face target: forward
</target action>

<follow action>

</follow action>

<finish action>
  move user: Home, 8
  face user: target
  immortal: targets, false
  wait for new line
  clear battle log
  wait for effect
  action common event
</finish action>
